name: RainonAirConditioner
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Air Conditioner”
”Alexa ask Rain on Air Conditioner to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on air conditioner
des:
Rain on Air Conditioner provides the sounds of rain falling on an air conditioner. This unique sound is ideal for sleep or to drown out distracting noises for better concentration.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Air Conditioner
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
